sentences.sContent: The lake was not frozen sufficiently to bear her; neither was it open, nor low enough that she could wade through it; and across it she must go if she would find her child!
sentences.sContent_eng: The lake was not frozen sufficiently to bear her; neither was it open, nor low enough that she could wade through it; and across it she must go if she would find her child!
sentences.sCn: 湖上还没有足够的厚冰可以托住她，但是水又不够浅，她不能涉水走过去。 不过，假如她要找到她的孩子的话，她必须走过这个湖。

synos.tran: 跋涉；可涉水而过的地方

phrases.pCn: 涉水（泥泞等）；费力地做完；艰难地通过
精神饱满地开始；猛烈攻击
vt. 插手，介入；猛烈攻击

words.tran: [鸟] 涉禽；涉水者，跋涉者；长筒防水靴
涉水（wade的ing形式）；艰难地通过

trans.tranOther: to walk through water that is not deep
